item.title: CentOS7 NetworkManager 管理网络
item.author: Schaepher
item.description: 工具 yum install -y NetworkManager-wifi 查看网卡状态 nmcli dev status 结果示例： 1 2 3 4 5 DEVICE TYPE STATE CONNECTION eth0 ethernet connected Wired connection 1 wlan0 wifi disconnected -- p2p-dev-wlan0 wifi-p2p disconnected -- lo loopback unmanaged -- 如果是 unavailable，则重启系统。 查看
